original_title: La Carrera Panamericana with Music by Pink Floyd
overview: La Carrera Panamericana is a 1992 video of the Carrera Panamericana automobile race in Mexico. The film was directed by Ian McArthur, it included a soundtrack entirely of music by the band Pink Floyd, as the band's guitarist David Gilmour, drummer Nick Mason and manager Steve O'Rourke competed in the race in 1991.
title: La Carrera Panamericana with Music by Pink Floyd
